snippet: A surprisingly weak report on industrial production in Germany, Europe’s biggest economy, added to investors’ concerns.
abstract: Stock market falls sharply on signs of weakening global growth.
lead_paragraph: A surprisingly weak report on industrial production in Germany, Europe’s biggest economy, added to investors’ concerns.

headline.main: Shares Slide After I.M.F. Cuts Outlook for Global Growth
headline.print_headline: Shares Slide After I.M.F. Cuts Outlook for Global Growth
